BlogEntry.Title: Changing ISPs
BlogEntry.Description: I'm changing my blog over to a new ISP.  If all goes as planned the DNS changes should prop and you should be seeing this.

BlogEntry.Title: CirculaFloor
BlogEntry.Description:
This is so cool.  You really have to watch the video [22MB MPG] to really see this thing in action.

(via JWZ)

BlogEntry.Title: EOS 20D details leaked
BlogEntry.Description: Check out the DPReview forums if you are interested in the devloping details.  The rumors have been flying for a good two weeks or so, but it looks like it is official.  Now the question is if there is going to be a new higher end camera (the EOS 3D) that has more features than the 20D but is smaller, lighter and cheaper than the 1D mk II.  I'd love to buy that camera.  I'm torn as to upgrade my D60 to the 20D.
